about.title: Game: Colors
about.descr: Benefit: Develops cognitive flexibility, ability to make quick decisions, suppress automatic reactions (Stroop effect).
about.rule1: 1. Look at the word — it's written in different colors! Click on the card that matches the color of the text, not its value. 🎨
about.rule2: 2. Make 15 correct answers in a row to win! 🏆

about.title: Game: Numbers
about.descr: Benefit: Improves visual perception, trains the ability to focus on the desired object among many distracting elements.
about.rule1: 1. You need to find and click on the card with the number that matches the number under the cards. 😊
about.rule2: 2. Make 15 correct answers in a row to win! 🏆

about.title: Game: Math Sprint
about.descr: Benefit: Develops speed of information processing, improves arithmetic skills, and helps train the brain for quick calculations.
about.rule1: 1. You need to find and click on the card with the correct answer. 😊
about.rule2: 2. Make 15 correct answers in a row to win! 🏆
